Statute.Title: Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Ministère des Affaires étrangères, du Commerce et du Développement, Loi sur le)

Minister.Text: Minister of Foreign Affairs (s. 2(2)); Minister for International Trade, additional minister relating to international trade (s. 3); Minister for International Development, additional minister relating to international development, poverty reduction and humanitarian assistance (s. 4)

Terminology.Text: Terminology, 2013, c. 33, s. 195 (every reference to the Department of Foreign Affairs and International Trade in any provision of an Act of Parliament) and ss. 196 to 198 (same but replace with a different Minister’s title)

CIF.Text: CIF, 2013, c. 33, ss. 174, 195 to 198 in force on assent 26.06.2013
CIF, 2013, c. 40, s. 175 in force on assent 12.12.2013
CIF, 2025, c. 1, s. 1 in force on assent 26.06.2025
